name: Fling Shot!
description:
Fling Shot! Is A 2D Physics Based Game Where You Must Guide A Ball To The Goal, Use Different Block To Affect The Ball And Move Past Obstacles. Simple Concept Fairly Short, But Fun. The Game Is Going To Receive Updates In The Future, With More Levels And Features, But This Is The First Full Public Release!

Features 

- Custom Design Your Ball, With 24 Different Designs And 24 Different Colors, You Can Make Your Ball Your Own.

- 60 Unique Levels

- Speedrun Mode

-Practice Mode

-Made With Love.

By Bbomb

Check Out My YT Channel That Has 3 Devlogs About Fling Shot! And Has More Content To Come - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiZ9HP3VGWYU41Dx5Qb7ZCA

Some Music And Sound Effects By https://www.zapsplat.com/
